quotes.quote: Always do sober what you said you'd do drunk. That will teach you to keep your mouth shut.
The worst thing about some men is that when they are not drunk they are sober.
A bumper of good liquor will end a contest quicker than justice, judge, or vicar.
Alcohol, taken in sufficient quantities, may produce all the effects of drunkenness.
Alcohol is necessary for a man so that he can have a good opinion of himself, undisturbed by the facts.
Alcohol is the anesthesia by which we endure the operation of life.
First you take a drink, then the drink takes a drink, then the drink takes you.
Its liquor is like the sweetest dew from Heaven.
Candy is dandy. But liquor is quicker.
Drunkenness is nothing but voluntary madness.
Better belly burst than good liquor be lost.
Alcohol may be man's worst enemy, but the bible says love your enemy.
A drunk man's words are a sober man's thoughts.
There are only two real ways to get ahead today - sell liquor or drink it.
Drink 'til the ground looks blue.
Drink washes off the daub and discovers the man.
One martini is all right. Two are too many, and three are not enough.
Here's to alcohol, the rose colored glasses of life.
You're not drunk if you can lie on the floor without holding on.
Almost anything can be preserved in alcohol, except health, happiness, and money.
Nothing uses up alcohol faster than political argument.
If drinking is interfering with your work, you're probably a heavy drinker. If work is interfering with your drinking, you're probably an alcoholic.
In wine there is wisdom, in beer there is Freedom, in water there is bacteria.
Drinking makes you happy with your body the way it is.

It's a great advantage not to drink among hard-drinking people. You can hold your tongue and, moreover, you can time any little irregularity of your own so that everybody else is so blind that they don't see or care.
Scotch whisky is made from barley and the morning dew on angel's nipples.
Wine is the most healthful and most hygienic of beverages.
Wine hath drowned more men than the sea.
It is 'Liquor Dealer.' It means soul stealer.
Alcohol, my permanent accessory. Alcohol, a party-time necessity. Alcohol, alternative to feeling like yourself. Oh alcohol, I still drink to your health.
